name: The Liminalverse
description:
Explore the slightly nostalgic liminal spaces, where each one may make you puzzled as you try to figure out how to get to the next area!

STORY:

One night you wake up in your bed, to a bright light. You get up to investigate and find out it is a portal. You walk through it, and it transports you to a universe that contains a series of Liminal Spaces, called The Liminalverse.

CONTROLS:

W, A, S, D - Move Around

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Left CTRL - Crouch

Right Mouse Button - Zoom In

CREDITS: GAME BY - JOHN F. MODELS BY - JOHN F. LEVEL DESIGNER - JOHN F. SFX - FREESOUND.ORG MUSIC SLOWED BY - ALEX KANSAS ART - JOHN F. PROGRAMMED BY - JOHN F.

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Download the .zip file.

2. Extract it.

3. Make sure to read the README.txt (its short-ish)

4. Open the Application and enjoy!
